Adenotonsillar hypertrophy.context: Preoperative Diagnosis: Adenotonsillar hypertrophy and chronic otitis media.

chronic otitis media.context: Preoperative Diagnosis: Adenotonsillar hypertrophy and chronic otitis media.

Tympanostomy and tube placement.context: Procedure Performed: 1. Tympanostomy and tube placement.   2. Adenoidectomy.

Adenoidectomy.context: Procedure Performed: 1. Tympanostomy and tube placement.   2. Adenoidectomy.

McIvor mouth gag.context: The patient was taken to the operating room, prepped and draped in the usual fashion. After induction of general endotracheal anesthesia, the McIvor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and a tongue depressor applied.

tongue depressor.context: The patient was taken to the operating room, prepped and draped in the usual fashion. After induction of general endotracheal anesthesia, the McIvor mouth gag was placed in the oral cavity and a tongue depressor applied.

Robinson catheters.context: Two #12-French red rubber Robinson catheters were placed, 1 in each nasal passage, and brought out through the oral cavity and clamped over a dental gauze roll placed on the upper lip to provide soft palate retraction.

adenoid bed.context: With the Bovie set at 50 coag and the suction Bovie tip on the suction hose, the adenoid bed was fulgurated by beginning at the posterosuperior aspect of the nasopharynx at the apex of the choana placing the tip of the suction cautery deep at the root of the adenoids next to the roof of the nasopharynx and then in a linear fashion making serial passages through the base of the adenoid fossa in parallel lines until the entire nasopharynx and adenoid bed had been fulgurated moving from posterior to anterior.

nasopharynx.context: With the Bovie set at 50 coag and the suction Bovie tip on the suction hose, the adenoid bed was fulgurated by beginning at the posterosuperior aspect of the nasopharynx at the apex of the choana placing the tip of the suction cautery deep at the root of the adenoids next to the roof of the nasopharynx and then in a linear fashion making serial passages through the base of the adenoid fossa in parallel lines until the entire nasopharynx and adenoid bed had been fulgurated moving from posterior to anterior.

left external auditory canal.context: The left external auditory canal was examined under the operating microscope and cleaned of ceruminous debris.

ceruminous debris.context: The left external auditory canal was examined under the operating microscope and cleaned of ceruminous debris.

anteroinferior quadrant tympanostomy inc.context: An anteroinferior quadrant tympanostomy incision was made.

fluid.context: Fluid was suctioned from the middle ear space, and a tympanostomy tube was placed at the level of the incision and pushed into position with the Rosen needle.

tympanostomy tube.context: Fluid was suctioned from the middle ear space, and a tympanostomy tube was placed at the level of the incision and pushed into position with the Rosen needle.

Cortisporin ear drops.context: Cortisporin ear drops were instilled into the canal, and a cotton ball was placed in the external meatus.

cotton ball.context: Cortisporin ear drops were instilled into the canal, and a cotton ball was placed in the external meatus.

right external auditory canal.context: By a similar procedure, the opposite tympanostomy and tube placement were accomplished.

tongue.context: The patient tolerated the procedure well and left the operating room in good condition.
